caption:
This image features a man intently working on a car in a garage setting. The man is dressed in a blue short-sleeved shirt and leans over the open window of a vintage pale-colored car. He appears to be either repairing something on the car or possibly inspecting it closely. His focused expression and the position of his hands suggest meticulous work.

The environment has a moody, dim lighting, likely inside a garage or workshop, with soft light filtering through the large windows in the background. The background is softly blurred, emphasizing the man and the car in the foreground. The composition captures a real-life scenario of vehicle maintenance or repair, highlighting a moment of concentration and manual skill. The overall tone and setting suggest an earlier era, given the vintage style of the car and the colors used in the photograph.
title: Exhaust analyzer is used to test for carbon monoxide and hydrocarbons coming from this car's tailpipe at an auto emission inspection station in Norwood, Ohio.  While that test is being conducted the city employee shown will make sure that an inspection is carried out concerning the horn, windshield wipers rearview mirror, safety glass, driver visibility, body condition turn signals, license plate lights front and rear, tires and headlights
